definition: variant of 毀|毁[hui3]/to destroy by fire/a blaze
to destroy/to damage/to ruin/to defame/to slander
variant of 毀|毁[hui3]/to defame/to slander
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

pinyin: Xiang1 hu4 Bao3 zheng4 Hui3 mie4

sentences.english: If your dream is to destroy the world, that is the great evil.
sentences.chinese: 而如果你的理想是毁灭世界，那才是大恶。

sentences.english: Knowledge without conscience is the ruination of the soul.
sentences.chinese: 没有道德依托的知识，是对人性的毁灭。

sentences.english: Self-revelation is at the same time self-destruction.
sentences.chinese: 自我显露同时也是自我毁灭。

sentences.english: Invisible things can't be destroyed. Period.
sentences.chinese: 无形的东西不会毁灭，句号。

sentences.english: The cost of non-compliance with industry regulations can be catastrophic.
sentences.chinese: 对于不符合工业规则的代价可能是毁灭性的。

sentences.english: The Death Star was to be an instrument of terror, meant to cow treasonous worlds with the threat of annihilation.
sentences.chinese: 死星是恐怖的工具，用毁灭来恐吓叛国的星球。

sentences.english: Surrounded by guardsoul the little guy can perish the old guy thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 被守护魄环绕着的小家伙能彻底毁灭老家伙。

sentences.english: This is why Pope Adrian IV set out to destroy Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 这是为何亚德连四世打算要毁灭爱尔兰。

sentences.english: Ginger bacterial wilt is a destructive disease caused by Pseudomonas solanacarum (Smith) Smith.
sentences.chinese: 姜瘟病是一种由青枯假单胞菌引起的生姜毁灭性病害。

sentences.english: As iron is eaten away by rust , so the envious are consumed by their own passion.
sentences.chinese: 就像铁被锈腐蚀，嫉妒被本身的情感毁灭。

sentences.english: In fire there is the spark of chaos and destruction, the seed of life.
sentences.chinese: 火焰蕴含着浑沌与毁灭的鼓动，以及生命的种子。

sentences.english: After the destruction of Varl, the Hutts migrated to other worlds.
sentences.chinese: 瓦尔毁灭之后，赫特人移居其他星球。

sentences.english: These verbs all refer to gradual change resulting in destruction or dissolution.
sentences.chinese: 这些动词都表示导致毁灭或分解的逐步变化。

sentences.english: Destruction and misery attend on war.
sentences.chinese: 毁灭和苦难伴随战争而来。

sentences.english: Is the nation seeing the seeds of destruction germinating ?
sentences.chinese: 国民看到毁灭的种子正在发芽吗？

sentences.english: Unprincipled concessions in diplomacy led to a crushing failure in real politics.
sentences.chinese: 外交上无原则的让步导致政治上一场毁灭性的失败。

definition: to fall down/to decay/to fall from the sky/to die
lit. scattered ashes and dispersed smoke (idiom)/fig. to be annihilated/to vanish in a puff of smoke
to extinguish/to become extinct/to die out
to be destroyed/to become extinct/to perish/to die out/to destroy/to exterminate
